title: Perform ABC Inventory Analysis
description: An analyst wants to classify all products into A, B, or C categories based on their value and sales volume to prioritize inventory management efforts.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all products with their annual sales volume and unit cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the raw data needed for the analysis.

tasks.description: Calculate the total annual consumption value for each product (Annual Sales x Unit Cost).
tasks.expected_outcome: The consumption value is calculated for every item.

tasks.description: Sort the products by consumption value and apply the ABC classification logic (e.g., 'A' items are the top 80% of value, 'B' the next 15%, 'C' the final 5%).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system assigns an A, B, or C category to each product.

tasks.description: Update the product master records with their new ABC classification.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ABC code is now a permanent attribute of each product.
